birth_place.en: Dangshan County, Song Prefecture, Tang Dynasty

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期后梁的开国皇帝。原为唐末参与黄巢起事的将领，后归降唐朝，官至宣武军节度使，逐渐控制朝政。907年篡唐自立，建立后梁。后为其子朱友珪所弑。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Later Liang dynasty during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period. He was originally a general in the Huang Chao Rebellion in the late Tang dynasty, later surrendering to the Tang and rising to the position of military governor (jiedushi) of the Xuanwu Army, gradually seizing control of the imperial court. In 907, he usurped the Tang throne and established the Later Liang. He was later assassinated by his son, Zhu Yougui.

description.zh-cn: 唐末民变领袖，大齐政权皇帝。
description.en: Leader of a major rebellion in the late Tang dynasty and emperor of the Qi dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐末的一场大规模民变，由黄巢领导，严重动摇了唐朝的统治。
description.en: A major rebellion during the late Tang dynasty led by Huang Chao, which severely weakened the Tang regime.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，被后梁所取代。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty that was succeeded by the Later Liang.

description.zh-cn: 唐末的河中节度使，朱温早年曾向其投降。
description.en: The military governor (jiedushi) of Hezhong during the late Tang dynasty, to whom Zhu Wen surrendered in his early career.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，在位期间爆发黄巢之乱。他接受了朱温的归降并赐名“全忠”。
description.en: An emperor of the Tang dynasty during whose reign the Huang Chao Rebellion broke out. He accepted Zhu Wen's surrender and bestowed upon him the name 'Quanzhong'.

description.zh-cn: 唐末沙陀族将领，晋王，朱温的主要竞争对手。
description.en: A Shatuo military leader in the late Tang dynasty, the Prince of Jin, and a major rival of Zhu Wen.

description.zh-cn: 朱温在汴州上源驿设宴款待李克用后，于夜间发兵围攻，意图将其杀害。李克用侥幸逃脱，二人从此结下深仇。
description.en: After hosting a banquet for Li Keyong at the Shangyuan Station in Bianzhou, Zhu Wen launched a surprise night attack in an attempt to assassinate him. Li Keyong managed to escape, and the incident marked the beginning of a deep-seated enmity between the two.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝倒数第二位皇帝，后期被朱温控制，最终遭其弑杀。
description.en: The second to last emperor of the Tang dynasty, who was controlled by Zhu Wen in his later years and eventually assassinated by him.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝末年宰相，为对抗宦官势力而召朱温入京，后被朱温所杀。
description.en: A chancellor in the late Tang dynasty who summoned Zhu Wen to the capital to counter the power of the eunuchs, but was later killed by Zhu Wen.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国中的第一个朝代，由朱温建立。
description.en: The first of the Five Dynasties during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, founded by Zhu Wen.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝末代皇帝，由朱温所立的傀儡皇帝，后被禅位并遭杀害。
description.en: The last emperor of the Tang dynasty, a puppet ruler installed by Zhu Wen, who was later forced to abdicate and was subsequently murdered.

description.zh-cn: 朱温第三子，后梁第二位皇帝。因不满朱温欲立养子朱友文为太子而发动政变，弑父篡位。
description.en: The third son of Zhu Wen and the second emperor of the Later Liang. He launched a coup and committed patricide to usurp the throne after becoming discontented with Zhu Wen's intention to make the adopted son Zhu Youwen the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 朱温的原配妻子，为人贤明，对朱温有一定影响力。
description.en: Zhu Wen's primary wife, known for her wisdom and virtue, who had a certain degree of influence over him.

description.zh-cn: 朱温嫡子，后梁末代皇帝。
description.en: The legitimate son of Zhu Wen and the last emperor of the Later Liang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 位于今安徽省，是朱温的出生地。
description.en: A county located in modern-day Anhui province, the birthplace of Zhu Wen.

description.zh-cn: 后梁的都城，朱温在此称帝并最终被杀。
description.en: The capital of the Later Liang dynasty, where Zhu Wen proclaimed himself emperor and was eventually killed.

description.zh-cn: 朱温的养子，原名康勤。因深得朱温宠爱，一度被考虑立为太子，引起朱友珪的嫉恨并最终被其杀害。
description.en: The adopted son of Zhu Wen, originally named Kang Qin. He was highly favored by Zhu Wen and was once considered to be made the crown prince, which incited the jealousy of Zhu Yougui and led to his murder.

description.zh-cn: 朱温于877年加入黄巢军，成为其麾下重要将领，后于882年叛离。
description.en: Zhu Wen joined Huang Chao's army in 877 and became a key general under his command, before defecting in 882.

description.zh-cn: 朱温于882年率部投降唐朝，被授以官职，成为唐末的藩镇节度使。
description.en: In 882, Zhu Wen surrendered to the Tang dynasty with his troops and was appointed as an official, becoming a provincial military governor (jiedushi) in the late Tang period.

description.zh-cn: 朱温逼迫唐哀帝禅位，篡夺了唐朝政权，建立了后梁。
description.en: Zhu Wen forced Emperor Ai of Tang to abdicate, usurped the Tang dynasty's power, and established the Later Liang.

description.zh-cn: 唐僖宗嘉奖朱温的归降，赐其名为“全忠”。
description.en: Emperor Xizong of Tang commended Zhu Wen for his surrender and bestowed upon him the name 'Quanzhong'.

description.zh-cn: 自884年上源驿之变后，朱温与李克用成为终身宿敌，双方长期对峙和征战。
description.en: Following the Incident at Shangyuan Station in 884, Zhu Wen and Li Keyong became lifelong arch-rivals, engaging in a long-term standoff and warfare.

description.zh-cn: 朱温在汴州上源驿策划并实施了对李克用的伏击。
description.en: Zhu Wen planned and executed an ambush against Li Keyong at the Shangyuan Station in Bianzhou.

description.zh-cn: 为对抗宦官势力，宰相崔胤召朱温率军进入京城。
description.en: To counter the power of the eunuchs, Chancellor Cui Yin summoned Zhu Wen to lead his army into the capital.

description.zh-cn: 朱温在掌控朝政后，杀害了曾召他入京的宰相崔胤。
description.en: After seizing control of the court, Zhu Wen killed Chancellor Cui Yin, who had once summoned him to the capital.

description.zh-cn: 朱温在将唐昭宗迁都洛阳后，派人将其弑杀。
description.en: After forcing Emperor Zhaozong of Tang to move the capital to Luoyang, Zhu Wen dispatched assassins to murder him.

description.zh-cn: 在弑杀唐昭宗后，朱温拥立其子李柷为帝，即唐哀帝，作为傀儡。
description.en: After assassinating Emperor Zhaozong, Zhu Wen installed his son Li Zhu as Emperor Ai of Tang to serve as a puppet ruler.

description.zh-cn: 朱温称帝后，于开平二年（908年）将已被废为济阴王的唐哀帝杀害。
description.en: After proclaiming himself emperor, Zhu Wen had the deposed Emperor Ai of Tang, then the Prince of Jiyin, murdered in the second year of Kaiping (908).

description.zh-cn: 907年，朱温接受唐哀帝“禅位”，正式称帝，建国号“梁”，史称后梁。
description.en: In 907, Zhu Wen accepted the 'abdication' of Emperor Ai of Tang, officially ascended the throne, and established the state of 'Liang', known in history as the Later Liang.

description.zh-cn: 朱友珪因担心父亲朱温另立养子朱友文为储君，发动政变，亲手弑父。
description.en: Fearing that his father Zhu Wen would appoint the adopted son Zhu Youwen as the crown prince instead, Zhu Yougui launched a coup and personally committed patricide.

description.zh-cn: 朱友文是朱温的养子，深受信赖和宠爱。
description.en: Zhu Youwen was the adopted son of Zhu Wen, deeply trusted and favored by him.

description.zh-cn: 朱友珪在弑父后，矫诏将竞争对手朱友文一并杀害。
description.en: After murdering his father, Zhu Yougui forged an edict and had his rival Zhu Youwen killed as well.
